onset.Description: Onset time of the first stimulus

duration.Description: Duration of trial from beginning of first stimulus to end of fixation

trial_type.Description: Category of trial based on stimuli characteristics

trial_name.Description: Category of trial based on stimuli characteristics

Levels.PicY: Matching pictures, corresponding English words rhyme
Levels.PicN: Mismatching pictures, corresponding English words do not rhyme
Levels.PercY: Matching perceptual condition, scrambed pictures exactly match
Levels.PercN: Mismatching perceptual condition, scrambed pictures do not match
Levels.FixY: Matching fixation condition, red/green fixation crosses
Levels.FixN: Mismatching fixation condition, red/green fixation crosses

prime_stim.Description: Location and name of first presented stimulus

targ_stim.Description: Location and name of second presented stimulus

response_time.Description: Subject response time measured from beginning of presentation of second stimulus

resp.Description: Subject input response with button box

cresp.Description: Correct response for the trial given stimulus characteristics

acc.Description: Indicates if participant made correct or incorrect response
